And <S%G2532><s%> supper <S%G1173><s%> being ended, <S%G1096><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> devil <S%G1228><s%> having now <S%G2235><s%> put <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> of Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> Simon's <S%G4613><s%> son, to <S%G2443><s%> betray <S%G3860><s%> him; <S%G846><s%>

He riseth <S%G1453><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> supper, <S%G1173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid aside <S%G5087><s%> his garments; <S%G2440><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> a towel, <S%G3012><s%> and girded <S%G1241><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

After that <S%G1534><s%> he poureth <S%G906><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a basin, <S%G3537><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to wash <S%G3538><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> disciples' <S%G3101><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to wipe <S%G1591><s%> them with the <S%G3588><s%> towel <S%G3012><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> girded. <S%G1241><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%> he to <S%G4314><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter: <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Peter <S%G1565><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> dost thou <S%G4771><s%> wash <S%G3538><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> feet? <S%G4228><s%>

I speak <S%G3004><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all: <S%G3956><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I have chosen: <S%G1586><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> may be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> He that eateth <S%G5176><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> hath lifted up <S%G1869><s%> his <S%G848><s%> heel <S%G4418><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> at the table <S%G345><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> what intent <S%G5101><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> unto him. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them thought, <S%G1380><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> bag, <S%G1101><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had said <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Buy <S%G59><s%> those things that <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of against <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> feast; <S%G1859><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he should give <S%G1325><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> poor. <S%G4434><s%>

Little children, <S%G5040><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> a little while <S%G3397><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> Ye shall seek <S%G2212><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Whither <S%G3699><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> go, <S%G5217><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> come; <S%G2064><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G737><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you. <S%G5213><s%>
